thread.section_title: Rome Times Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Brilliant located friendly hotel
thread.title_full: Brilliant located friendly hotel - Review of Rome Times Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: holsforus
title: Brilliant located friendly hotel
text:
This was our first visit to Rome, this hotel is welcoming , modern, airy, and ultra clean.
All the staff were friendly and we felt very welcome .
This is a small hotel, but the rooms were great, complementary fridge on first night, with juice, soft drinks, etc.
The beds were really comfy and all the fitting and furnishings of a high standard, breakfast was plentiful, and all presented well.
It's situated in a side street but very near all the beautiful sights of Rome, even though we were advised to take the metro to Vatican City, due to distance, we comfortably walked it, and enjoyed all the sights of Rome as we walked.
We have no hesitation in endorsing this hotel, we loved Rome, well fell in love with this wonderful city, and can't wait to come back, and of course stay at Rome Times Hotel
